question_text: A stranger walks into your home. How does your cat react?

options.text: Vanishes into the void (Hides immediately)
The Security Guard (Watches suspiciously from afar)
The Polite Greeter (Sniffs shoes, then leaves)
The Party Animal (Demands pets from everyone)

question_text: It's 3:00 AM. What is your cat doing?

options.text: Sound asleep (probably snoring)
The 'Zoomies' (Parkour off the walls)
Singing the song of their people (Meowing loudly)
Sleeping on my face

question_text: How does your cat handle 'Cuddle Time'?

options.text: Do not perceive me (Avoids touch)
I will sit *near* you, not *on* you
Pet me... but only exactly 3 times
Velcro Cat (Stuck to my side 24/7)

question_text: What is their favorite type of toy?

options.text: Anything moving (Lasers, Feathers)
Puzzle toys (Requires brain power)
A crumpled receipt or bottle cap
They prefer judging me from a distance
Silent observer (Rarely meows)
Chirps at birds through the window
Only when the food bowl is empty
Full conversations (Meows back when spoken to)
